sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PlannedTaskCustomConsoleValidator</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PlannedTaskCustomConsoleValidator</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PlannedTaskCustomConsoleValidator = Class.create();
PlannedTaskCustomConsoleValidator.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	tableAllowed: function(table) {
		var gr  = new GlideRecord(table);
		if ( gr.isValid() && gr.instanceOf('planned_task') && gr.canCreate() )
			return gr.instanceOf('pm_project');
		return false;
	},
	
	validateAccess: function(consoleId, userId) {
		var c = new PlannedTaskCustomConsole(consoleId);
		if ( !c.isValid() ) 
			return false;

		if ( c.owner() == userId )
			return true;

		var members = c.members();
		while ( members.next() ) {
			if ( members.getValue('user') == userId )
				return true;
		}
		return false;
	},

    type: 'PlannedTaskCustomConsoleValidator'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-11-19 08:03:24</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>83d7bfb137330200455726877e41f18e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PlannedTaskCustomConsoleValidator</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">e93557642fc10110d8a4d5f62799b623</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_83d7bfb137330200455726877e41f18e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-02-21 17:34:10</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>723</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
